Introducing “GSD Operation” – Your Efficient Ticket Management Extension.
GSD Operation is a Chrome extension designed to streamline ticket processing for Global Service Desk (GSD) members. It simplifies the process by automating the filling of ticket fields through predefined rules, reducing the need for manual data entry.
In addition to its automation capabilities, GSD Operation serves as a reminder system for ticket handlers to input effort for each ticket. It also facilitates collaboration by automatically tagging tickets for both GSD and development team members upon resolution. Specifically optimized for the ServiceNow website, it aims to enhance efficiency in the effort input process.
Experience a more straightforward approach to ticket management with GSD Operation – your solution for a more efficient workflow with fewer manual tasks.
